content.description: Should clean up nicely and be a great route for beginners or fat old men like me.
content.location: Located on the Pied Piper Wall in the Maple Corridor. The wall is directly east of EIS and Raindrops on Lichen. Rat Killer is left of the Maple Tree against the wall, right of the water streak that separates the Pied Piper Wall and the Pied Piper Pinnacle.

Located on the Pied Piper Wall in the Maple Corridor. The wall is directly east of EIS and Raindrops on Lichen. The Pied Piper Pinnacle is essentially the left most portion of the wall with an independent summit. It starts left of the water streak that separates the Pied Piper Wall and the Pied Piper Pinnacle.

content.description:
On the right side of the

Maple Corridor

near the entrance is a short clean face with a few bolted lines.  Monkey Nuts is slightly harder than

Loogie

, but not enough to change the grade.  It is also a good warm-up.
content.location:
Monkey Nuts sit on the right side entrance of the

Maple Corridor

. n It is directly across from

EIS, Your Little Sister, and Raindrops

.

content.description:
On the right side of the

Maple Corridor

near the entrance is a short clean face with a few bolted lines.

Loogie

climbs straight up.  Loogie and Monkey Nuts used to share the first bolt, but these two routes were separated in 2016, and extended at least one bolt higher with replaced anchors. Much improved. A Good warm-up.
content.location:
Loogie

sits on the right side entrance of the

Maple Corridor

. It is directly across from

EIS, Your Little Sister, and Raindrops

.

content.description: Crux is before midpoint. Very mossy currently, gets better with every ascent, but should clean up with traffic. May become easier as holds emerge
content.location: This route is on the lower east wall of the Corridor, about 7-8feet left of Loogie.

content.description: The crux is about midway. There is loose rock (surprise...!?) Will clean up.
content.location: The route is about 25' R of Monkey nuts, and 8' R of another new route.
The route is about 15 - 20' right of Monkey Nuts, and 8' left of another moderate 5.6 route down there.
